Communist Party of the United States of America Records
Subseries II.C: New York State, Records of Jarvis Tyner
Subseries II.C: New York State, Records of Jarvis Tyner

Jarvis Tyner has held a variety of leadership positions during his many years as a Party member; he is currently the Executive Vice-Chair of the Communist Party, USA. This subseries contains records that derive from his time as Chair of the New York State District and reflect Tyner's involvement in a variety of initiatives at all levels of the Party. Included here are materials pertaining to African American equality, civil rights, and civic concerns such as housing and unemployment with an emphasis on New York City during the 1970s and 1980s. Tyner's notes, reports, and correspondence also provide a portrait of his participation in the work of several national bodies such as the Political Bureau and the National Conventions.
